content: Are you receiving any error messages? ".gov" servers often have more restrictions on email services
creator: davidsk

content: What are the specifics in the URL the error message is directing you to? It may be blacklisiting your IP address, which is separate from the webmail's IP address.
creator: davidsk

content: Please be more specific. Generally, when a password is not presented, the email provider sends a request for password, which generates a prompt by thunderbird for the password. If you are receiving error message, knowing that may help
creator: davidsk

content: Add your gmail (or any other) account so the Local Folders location is created. Then, Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, copy the .mbox file from Google Takeout into Mail/Local Folders, remove the .mbox extension, restart TB, find a folder with the name of the mbox under Local Folders in the Folder Pane.
creator: sfhowes

content:
The update to 128.10.2 or 138.0.2 has a fix for such folders appearing blank.

"Messages could not be viewed if the profile used a UNC path"
creator: sfhowes

content: Al momento non ci sono alternative. LocalFolders è realizzata da uno sviluppatore indipendente, per cui il suo aggiornamento non dipende da Mozilla. Tra l'altro l'aggiornamento di Thunderbird in un ambiente di produzione non era affatto necessario dato che la versione 128 ESR è ancora supportata. Consiglio questa lettura -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/scegliere-canale-rilascio-thunderbird
creator: @next

content: I do not know what problem you are having without knowing specific details. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: It may help if you provide details on whatever your issues are. Thank you.
creator: davidsk
